turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Jeff can you call Italo's and order the family size pizza for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, do you want me to call Italos' now, or in an hour?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Call them for me now please. Ask them if they can skip the banana peppers and add jalapeno's .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, will do, no banana pepper add jalapeno's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, let me know when I can pick that up. I'm starving.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, I'll give them a call now and i will get right back to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, my mouth is watering.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, I need to order a family sized pizza, can you leave off the banana peppers and add jalapeno's, ok, you can, great, when will that be ready? 25 minutes, ok, great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So, when can I go pick up my pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They said it will be ready in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are they going to leave off the banana peppers and add the Jalapeno's instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea, they said that wouldn't be a problem at all.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, they have the best pizza in town.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have heard, I am going to need to try it some time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are more than welcome to have some of mine if you like ham, mushrooms, pepperoni and jalapeno's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sound delicious, sure, i'd love a piece or two.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You had them charge my account for it, didn't you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea, the said they would use the card they have on file.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, great, oh yea, I just got a text with confirmation on the card used and the total. Thanks again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I can go pick that up for you if you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's ok, I have to go that way anyway at lunch time, so hopefully you aren't too hungry yet.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, I'm not, I can't wait another couple hours or more to eat. Thanks again for lunch.

items.name: I just got a text with confirmation on the card used and the total.
